patthana23.26:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.26:2.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.26:3.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
